droit.1: In pursuit of technical beauty behind artistic rigour.
droit.2: I aspire to be a technical artist. To that end, I am seeking to develop in-depth mastery of production and its techniques. Whether it be programming, game design, or art, especially hard surface and procedural 3D modelling.
droit.3: I am currently graduating from CGacademy as a video game artist. I want to continue improving my skills while remaining available for any offers or collaborations. One day, with my classmates and our skills, I will co-found a studio.

1.description: Swiss sabre planted in a mountain environment. Model, matÃ©rials and set made from scratch. I feel that this type of sword is particularly elegant.

2.description: Isometric view of a mad scientist lab. My goal was to present modern chemistry equipment in a dirty medieval set.

3.description:

There were many iterations before arriving at such a dark and gloomy result. Les premiÃ¨res versions mettant bien plus en avant le meuble central dans un style bien plus propre.

4.description:
Procedural Chandelier made with Houdini. It takes inspiration from Chateau de Versailles's baroque style.
It's entirely configurable in every detail.

5.description:
Entirely Procedural Arcade Cabinet made with Houdini. It's fully-configurable with up to 6 different button layouts!
Initialy created for day 2 of Nodevember 2023

6.description: Isometric Kitchen inspired by my great grandma's.

7.description: Procedural microphone stand made with Houdini.

8.description: Some renders of the famous Italian shotgun. Procedural texture made on blender.

9.description: An urban cuisine of Japanese pastries. Selling daifukus, dangos, sakura mochis and anpans.

10.description: An Italian kitchen with a beautiful view over a landscape inspired by Sienne.

11.description: An environment inspired by the Algiers coastline at the time of the Regency of Algiers. In other words, the golden age of Barbarossa and Otoman piracy.

12.description: Reproduction of a chapel in the Belfry Park in Mons. Modelling carried out in a short space of time.

13.description: A train station with brutalist inspiration

14.description:
Reproduction de la Honda Civic type R de 2020. It's the first vehicle I've managed to model completely. It's been a great learning experience on 3DS Max.
A series of renders at the water's edge and for a challenge asking you to imagine a travelling salesman. So it's a grandmother from Vaucleuse selling her fruit in a racing car.

15.description: Reproduction of a Citizen watch. It's the same as the one I wear every day.

16.description:
Blue still life.
First render with houdini.

17.description: green still life inspired bu a environnement of the game control. With a second inspired by impressionist painting

18.description: Still life with yellow tints following the advices of Anthony.

20.description: Final still life, on orange hue like a sunset.

21.description: Reproduction of the character from the animated film Justin and the knight of valour. First experience of modelling a complete character.

22.description: a vampire with the head of an asparagus

24.description:
Plans for a fictional ultra-rich academy.
Made for Venus as part of an rp.

25.description: Immaginary mocup for a platform game featuring a cosmo tardigrade, the world's smallest bard, facing off against the boss, the cosmonaut.

26.description: Compilations of drawings made in 2023. Mostly while lessons.

27.description: Realisation of a level design for a fictionnal stealth game highly inspired by the gameplay of the latest Hitman.

28.description: An environment inspired by the Diakonievene nature park. Cradled in a delicate autumnal light.

29.description:
Reflection on a new mechanic for the fish stick protocol game and production of an animation presenting it.
Work carried out with Meredith R., Marc V. and Ianis S.

30.description:
A survivor like blended with fruit ninja, it can only work, isn't it ?
Work carried out with Sandy R., Cyril N., Anthony R. et Brieux D.

31.description: A cave containing a clandestine factory for manufacturing android sex toys.

32.description: A few chellengs to recreate a Zelda-inspired dungeon with specific mechanisms in 4H

33.description:
Introduction to motion capture using professional equipment
Done with Armand C. and Maxime F.

34.description:
A game about making tricks with a boat cruising through a sea of stars. Now with a real life steering helm!
This is a game made for school with my friends Luca Mevis, Cyril Naessens and Marc Verdonk during a 5 day workshop. We had to create an arcade game using an handmade custom controller. We decided to make a game in which you pilot a ship that can jump on waves and do tricks in the air, SSX style. All of that using a steering wheel made of papier-mache and a mouse. The game is made using Unreal Engine 5 (Blueprint). I loved working on this project, since it was using an alternative controller. Programming the player's behaviour was a totally different thing since I had to take the weird controller into account.

35.description: A web based strategy game in which you have to upgrade and buy ships to become the greatest space pirate !This is a game I made with my friends Luca Mevis and Cyril Naessens for school. We had to create a game design document and then try to make a game out of it. The game is available here.

36.description: A web based strategy game in which you have to upgrade and buy ships to become the greatest space pirate !This is a game I made with my friends Luca Mevis and Cyril Naessens for school. We had to create a game design document and then try to make a game out of it. The game is available here.

37.description: Level design exercise involving creating a level for the game Stealth Bastard. Work done in a group with Ana T. and Cyril N., in which I was in charge of the intermediate difficulty level. We tried to make the most of the mechanics of the portable portal.

38.description: First game jame inspired by the mobile fame tentacle war. Made with Lightbolt, Breniak, ThÃ©o D. and Neil P.

39.description: A Wario Ware like with a guitar hero controler. A project I made with friends during Global Game Jam 2024. It is made using Unity. Over the course of the weekend, we managed to design and implement 11 mini-games exploiting all the possibilities offered by the controller.

40.description: Game from the third game jam. A platformer inspired by Celeste with bubbles and Shonk, the blue shark. Made with Meg B., Cyril N., Jules V., Rafael R., Lucas J. and Nathan A. On this project, I did all the programming and coordinated a lot of the game design.

42.description: Interpretation of Akhenaten's palace at Amarna. Thanks to the amrna3D project and to all the archaeologists for inspiring me. Although it's meant to be historical, the building is unrealistically large to show off its power. Made on Unreal.

43.description: Materials used in the Amarna enviro project, an interpretation of the throne room in Akhenaten's palace.

44.description: A prototype of platformer. Environment inspired by the game ECHO.

45.description: A two-season environment inspired by the Santa Teresa nature park.

46.description: Hard surface modeling of the Rickenbacker 4001 fretless. Game ready model. This is a BASS, not a guitar.
